description: This file defines interfaces related to warning reporting control within the WPEFramework, including warning events, reporting units, and control mechanisms.

classes.name: IWarningEvent
classes.description: Interface for warning events, providing methods for categorization, serialization, deserialization, and string representation.

classes.name: IWarningReportingUnit
classes.description: Interface for warning reporting units, enabling warning event reporting and category management.

classes.name: IWarningReportingControl
classes.description: Interface for control objects managing warning categories, allowing exclusion and configuration.

methods.name: IWarningEvent::Category
methods.description: Returns the category of the warning event.

methods.name: IWarningEvent::Serialize
methods.description: Serializes the warning event into a byte array.

methods.name: IWarningEvent::Deserialize
methods.description: Deserializes a byte array into a warning event.

methods.name: IWarningEvent::ToString
methods.description: Converts the warning event to a string representation.

methods.name: IWarningEvent::IsWarning
methods.description: Indicates whether the event is a warning.

methods.name: IWarningReportingUnit::ReportWarningEvent
methods.description: Reports a warning event associated with an identifier.

methods.name: IWarningReportingUnit::FetchCategoryInformation
methods.description: Fetches details about a given warning category.

methods.name: IWarningReportingUnit::AddToCategoryList
methods.description: Adds a category control to the category list.

methods.name: IWarningReportingUnit::RemoveFromCategoryList
methods.description: Removes a category control from the category list.

methods.name: IWarningReportingControl::Configure
methods.description: Configures control settings for a category.
